title: Number Line
text: To think about this question, you might want to locate -3 and -7 on a number line.

title: Using Number Line to Reach Conclusion
text: For numbers a and b, when a is to the right of b on the number line, we say $$a>b$$ (read \"a is greater than b\").

title: Answer
text: Since -3 is to the right of -7 on the number line, we say $$-3>-7$$.
